page.title: 08Trade N.E. of Baldock
page.content:
There is little trade outside Baldock except for a few farms selling farm produce{at the gate}and Dwarf Pyramids which sell apples and pears from their orchard at Bygrave. These activities are obviously related to the importance of the private car.
The cash and carry warehouse just outside Baldock on the A505 is based on the same economic principle, as are the garages in Baldock, two of which offer accident car collection and repair, a reflection of the dangerous section of A505 in this block.
The few shops in square 9 are either {service based,}eg. hairdressers, building societies, estate agents, or {specialist shops,}eg. antiques, watch maker/repairer,DIY.
